# Dr. Marissa Tremblay

Dr. Marissa Tremblay is an Assistant Professsor at Purdue University in the Department of Earth, Atmospheric, and Planetary Sciences. Marissa is the PI of the Thermochronology \@ Purdue (T\@P) research group, which includes a noble gas mass spectrometry facility focused on measurements of comsmogenic and radiogenic noble gases. She's excited to be here!
